name: CVE-2020-15358
description: In SQLite before 3.32.3, select.c mishandles query-flattener optimization, leading to a multiSelectOrderBy heap overflow because of misuse of transitive properties for constant propagation.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:sqlite:sqlite:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:20.04:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:apple:iphone_os:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:apple:watchos:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:icloud:*:*:*:*:*:windows:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:apple:tvos:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:apple:ipados:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:apple:macos:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:outside_in_technology:8.5.4:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:outside_in_technology:8.5.5:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:hyperion_infrastructure_technology:11.1.2.4:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:enterprise_manager_ops_center:12.4.0.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:communications_network_charging_and_control:12.0.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:mysql:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:communications_network_charging_and_control:6.0.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:communications_messaging_server:8.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:communications_cloud_native_core_policy:1.14.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:siemens:sinec_infrastructure_network_services:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
